website_summaries.verdict: A rechargeable, waterproof lighter that is great for camping, hiking, and traveling.
pros: Features a 75° slope pole design that ensures you can light cigarettes and cigars on a flat surface
Includes a high-quality zinc alloy and high temperature-resistance ceramic plate
Delivers an exceptional combination of style and function
cons: May need to be recharged frequently

customer_reviews.title: This lighter is beautiful and the plasma arcs are beautiful but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This lighter is beautiful and the plasma arcs are a wonderful electric lavender color. customer_reviews.author: phi

customer_reviews.text: These nifty lighters are awesome to have because they dont require gas/liquid fuel and they can be used forever-as long as you take care of them! Product is not quality made, the only reason I'm giving this 1 star instead of zero is their customer service is very quick to respond and helpful. But good customer service doesn't absolve shoddy product design or manufacturing. Do not buy this unless you like a good looking, non-functional paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good price, crappy battery
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to use these lighters the second I bought them. The excitement quickly dissipated as I realized the battery on these things was horrendous. They're great for windy situations but other than that, I prefer to use a regular lighter so I don't need to deal with the battery problem
customer_reviews.author: Aida Tavarez

I always make sure and shut it after each use to "reset" it and it seems to last longer this way... The reason I stuck with these lighters is the design makes it SOO MUCH EASIER to light whatever "herb" your smoking from a pipe.

customer_reviews.text: if you are a little nerdy like myself, then you surely will love burning things in this futuristic lighter!! this is a great conversation piece at the least, let alone how cool it is to use lol. highly recommended, and it last me about two weeks with daily usage. biggest difference between this and a standard butane lighter is the TASTE difference! customer_reviews.author: KingChoup17

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift for anyone that smokes
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my aunt that smokes. I was really happy with the box it came with because it makes a presentable gift. I hate the plastic bags. It came charged so I was able to use it and it was surprisingly almost as small as a box of matches, which i like since she wears small purses. Read the review about getting tassed so I hope that does not happen. "Little lighter please don't tasse my favorite aunt. Amen"
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It's just like a butane, but rechargeable. It seems to hold a lot of charges, and has some nice safety features. N.B Unlike a flame lighter, an arc lighter does not produce much light, if any at all. The arc lighter will react with metal and jump to it. The lighter produces extremely high temperatures, enough to burn through cloth like a welding tool. Overall, Looks good, holds many charges, and is quite affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this lighter
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it freaking adorable but it's compact and powerful. Can't really light up a bowl or anything but awesome for cigs and candles.

customer_reviews.title: Use a SLOW charger!
customer_reviews.text: I believe I've learned a little something with some of these small electronic devices that just come with a USB cable. Do not use a fast charger that you use for your phone. Use a cheap slow charger or you will toast the battery. Other than that it's quite a nice little lighter and worked great until it burnt out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Rader

customer_reviews.text: I got this on Monday and I charge it keep in the box was working last night now it's not dose this have child safe feature edit just figured why it was not working had to exam it bit more their is a blue wire that is pitch when you lift up flap to light anything that's is the issue not charging you can fix it by carefully pitch the blue wire to a metal plate and make sure dose not move from that plate when you lift the flap up and you lighter works again

customer_reviews.title: Works great, more novelty than practical cigar lighter
customer_reviews.text: The lighter works great. It's a fun lighter, but it's really a novelty. It will light candles, etc just fine. It's a little difficult on a cigar as it doesn't radiate the heat very well and you have to get a cigar very close. I could see this working better as a cigarette lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Plasma Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I love lighting candles and incense in our house and needed an extra lighter. We purchased a plasma lighter while back and that we loved (and still use) and I am happy to say that I love this one as well. It has a slim design and a touch button. It turns off automatically if you don't close the top which is a great safety feature. If I had to give one critique, I would say I wish I got it in a different color since the shiney black I got it in shows fingerprints. lol
customer_reviews.author: Chakris Ngeunjuntr

customer_reviews.title: mini lightsaber...
customer_reviews.text: So much awesome. I don't smoke. I never really even have to light anything on fire. But I bought this... cause it's awesome. The arc, the sound it makes when igniting. So cool. Just a warning though... if you try to light something on fire that's metal (like I dunno, the zippo handwarmer thingy) you will get a tiny electrical shock. Doesn't hurt. Tickles a bit. It'll light it though. Played with it for a while, still hasn't needed re-charging.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after limited use.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this lighter. It was different and usually got ooos and awes from folks I’d smoke with. But then it broke. For $18 I expected this lighter to last longer than 7 months. It just stopped working one day. Not sure what happened that would have caused it. And because I’m not a heavy smoker, it’s not like it’s from overuse or just normal wear and tear. I used it maybe 3-5 times a week at least and 1-2 times per day at most. Anyhow, overpriced for 7 months of limited use.
customer_reviews.author: NTD

customer_reviews.title: 5 Second Light Limit
customer_reviews.text: I use this strictly for MMJ and it's great to light a joint or blunt but not so great to relight if it takes more than 5 seconds to get it going. I think this is more of a cigarette lighter than for MMJ but for being well built, clever design, and smart looking, it's worth the money. It's also cool that it's all electric, no mess with butane or lighter fluid. Just plug it in and don't use it for more than 5 seconds at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, somewhat short battery!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for smoking pipe tobacco, I found I had to light the bowl in different areas, holding each are a few seconds at a time, sometimes doing that twice. Doing this seems to lower the battery pretty quickly! It may last me 5-6 smoke sessions, but seems to charge in about an hour. I am quite pleased with the product! If one only has to use it a second or two at a time for lighting things then it will last much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighter for cigarettes!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of this lighter and how so easy it is to use no matter how windy it is. My photo should point out how the flame is just that, a still flame and not a fire easily blown out by the wind. You simply place your finger right below it and only press lightly and the flame comes on, place cigarette in it and it lights up right away, no struggling or anything. So if this lasts I’ll always love this type of lighter, IMO it’s perfect for cigarettes.
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lighter, GREAT quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter! Wow, I haven't ever tried one of these before but wanted to cut down on going through so many lighters! This thing is great! It stays charged a really long time. It works in the wind which regular lighters never do! Major plus over regular lighters. It has a time out so if you leave the lid open to long it will not let it fire until you close it and open it, it's already saved myseld from lighing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Gave up on me after a month
customer_reviews.text: The product was working well, never ran into any issues and the battery life was actually pretty good. But after about a month of usage it gave up on me. I took it apart and found out that the reason why it wasn't working was because one of the wires somehow disconnected. I was able to fix it temporarily, but ended up throwing it away of its inconsistency. Edit 06/05/19: The company reached out to me personally and offered me a brand new lighter. The new lighter actually works beautifully and I have been using it extensively since I received the new one and ran into no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter
customer_reviews.text: I love cigars and I was a little skeptical at first about using an electric lighter for my cigars, but it works. I've gone weeks without recharging. 4 stars

If you have any manual dexterity problems, this is a great lighter! Don’t forget to charge it!

It's rechargeable but the wire is so small but that's not an issue for me.

This company makes you feel that the product was made for you by another person instead of a company mass producing the product. Overall, amazing.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!

customer_reviews.author: Mike

It was a single Arc lighter and cumbersome to use but it worked. However like I said it was a cheap lighter and the recharging receptacle became loose and I could no longer charge it. I miss the lighter so I bought one of these lighters. It is great. The double Arc and the slope make it easy to use while riding your bike. I love it. You know what they say. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: roadmower

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: It's working very well, but keep in mind: the flame/arc is very small. This is a cigarette lighter, NOT a cigar lighter. You can start a bonfire with it I guess, but just remember the flame is really small.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyChrome

customer_reviews.title: Best geometry for lighting a bowl. Wish the time-out was twice as long

Seems to be well constructed and hopefully will be a reliable ignition source into the distant future.
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: It’s stylish, rugged, and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have several plasma lighters. This one is by far my favorite. I actually have to. A man should always have a means of starting a fire. It also has enough style that you could take it to a black tie affair.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Wrath

customer_reviews.title: Very practical gadget for smokers
customer_reviews.text: The thought of not having to buy butane or worry about my other lighters getting low is wonderful. I’m a gadget freak so this was the most practical purchase in a long time. I am a little disappointed to be honest. 3 stars because it really is a beautiful lighter just seems like a got a defective one..

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s overall a great product. The only thing is if you accidentally touch it the shock hurts high key. && if you leave it open it drains the battery. But charges quick,, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Jayla Aiyana

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my sister as a Christmas gift in the "magic color" She really likes it. I went with this model because of the tilt & went with the magic color so it would be easier to find (i.e. not lose). My sister immediately noticed both of these. She has admitted to dropping it already. Only a tiny scratch. However, there are no dents.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleMoonrise

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Its deferent than a flame lighter that it doesn't flare up like butane lighters that can burn your face while lighting your cigarette. It takes a little time to get use to the deferent lighting technics but it works every time. All you got to do is charge it and it keeps lighting every time.
customer_reviews.author: Candia M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good design, gets hot.
customer_reviews.text: The lighter is designed well. It does light, but the entire lighter gets very hot. I'm not sure if that is supposed to happen. Since there is a battery, the heat makes me worry that it may blow up. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Mithoon Patel

customer_reviews.title: Compact and very sleek looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very compact and sleek looking lighter. Works perfect for lighting candles or fires without worrying about the flame going out and the part you touch doesnt get hot. I love that it's rechargeable. Much easier to use and works better then a flame lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one week on minimal use and charged according to your manual which I followed to a T
customer_reviews.text: After only a week of using it now and it already wont hold a charge I get one cigarette lit and it’s dead when it’s supposed to last hours on a full charge and I’m using it for a split second maybe 6-7 times a day! I thought this would be the last lighter I ordered but it’s a piece of junk that lasted not even a week before the coils won’t spark and the low battery light blinks even on a full charge after one ignition and now feel mines came defective
customer_reviews.author: Derek Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: This works great until it doesn't approximately 2 moths.
customer_reviews.text: I like the tech. Held a charge pretty good, about 25 or 30 lites before it just stopped working and will not recharged. Bought in July busted in September. I really liked it too. Try others.
customer_reviews.author: Obiwan

customer_reviews.title: I've also dropped it into the toilet and it worked fine after it dried
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted!!! I've had it for 3 months now and it's working perfectly. Only takes an hour to charge and it lasts for 2-3 days and I smoke a pack a day. I've also dropped it into the toilet and it worked fine after it dried. Works in the wind and rain. Also I got the black color which seems to be better quality. Would buy again but I don't think I'll have to. I've saved so much money on regular lighters now
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farronato

customer_reviews.title: Works great.....until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Bought in october 2018 and quit working april 2019.....6 months....worked great until then. Warranty is only 60 days, i should have read more closely before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchasing this item
customer_reviews.text: Easy, quick, safe and great conversation piece. Less expensive than other brands. Added feature of angled lighter is great. Can light cigars!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Gets ya Fired up
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Great for camping and lighting fresh candles. it’s a little tough when it comes to tight spaces... naturally ;) but anything not in a deep container is perfect. Shocked myself a couple times and WOO might substitute that for my morning coffee. this’ll get ya fired up both mentally/ physically/ and with literal flames. Would buy again but hopefully I won’t need too
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not really good for a regular cigar
customer_reviews.text: probably ok for a cigarillo,or cigarette, but shuts off before lighting a full thickness cigar. I had to set it aside and continue using my flame thrower butane lighters.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, Great Appearance !!
customer_reviews.text: Strong light !! Very nice and sleek looking. Love the battery level indicator and also touch screen no button pretty cool !
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Connell

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves This...No Butane!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lighter! Gave it to my husband for Christmas. It’s electronic, no butane and charges with almost any USB charger you have at home. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: roz klein

customer_reviews.title: No more Multiple Trys
customer_reviews.text: Lets start out by saying a rechargeable lighter is genius. I tend to spend a lot of time outside. So with outside usually being windy this lighter lights on the first try and stays lit till I'm smoking. for that alone I recommend. the fact that it will turn it self off and won't light if you have left the lid open too long is a blessing. No more burns/potential accidents. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Ellyson

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: Maybe some do? Mine lasted until Sept then it became a chore to try to charge it. Now it's jus broken. I also didn't like the slant.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrial

customer_reviews.title: No more struggling to get that joint sparked on your walk with the puppy anymore
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter. Has a great safety features. Auto shutoff when its done charging, and if you keep it lit for too long. Great for joints and the occasional bowl. But takes some finess in the bowl. No butain tatse. And recharges fast. Was definitely worth the$
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sprinkle-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Also windproof!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today . Couldn't be happier with it. I ordered the color called "magic"Looks great, feels good in your hand. Quality is very good. It came with a charging cord.It's charged and ready to go now! I just ordered another one for my Mom. She has arthritis and the ignition button is so easy to use for her. She has trouble with that on disposable lighters
customer_reviews.author: Bmxgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Works on cigars but different
customer_reviews.text: I smoke cigars and I find it works but it is so different from an actual flame I am still getting used to the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, when you hold it in your hand you can tell it's good quality. Bought it for the wife she loved the color and his you don't get the fuel taste when she smokes cigars.Im glad I got this style over the there one. Much easier to light.

customer_reviews.title: Junk don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was cool til recently this lighter stopped working properly. Only three prongs light up now. Tried cleaning the tips or even wiping off and nope. Still sucks. Big waste of money do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Nick Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for two weeks now and have only had to charge it once despite using it daily. It works perfectly each and every time with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Blade Runner

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking but not practical
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice looking lighter, but only holds a charge for about a day. So, you are constantly charging it... really a bit of an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding- Looks so beautiful when you light it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use - gorgeous when lit and super easy to use for incense and candles. All my friends are jealous! I would imagine it would work well for cigarette use as well! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenji Dawnwood

customer_reviews.title: Purple's Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lighter. Perfect for cigarettes. It will work on pipes but not as well as the "arc flame" is close to the lighter. It will save money on desposible lighters. Good product and good value...
customer_reviews.author: David Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for 2 days
customer_reviews.text: The product was great and worked as intended for about 2 days. 4 days later when I use it, the lighter only arcs for half a second before shutting off and blinking 5 times. It's a shame because I really liked the design and functional use of these lighters and would have loved to continue using it. I would try to troubleshoot but the manual doesn't have any troubleshooting instructions unfortunately.
